code: class AudioManager{constructor(){this.audioBackground=new Audio("/music/bg_sound.mp3");this.audioFail=new Audio("/music/wrong.mp3");}setAudioBackground(src){this.audioBackground.src=src;}setAudioFail(src){this.audioFail.src=src;}playBackgroundSound(){this.audioBackground.play().catch(error=>{console.error('Audio play failed:',error);console.log('Audio play failed:',error);});}playSoundGameOver(){this.audioFail.play().catch(error=>{console.error('Audio play failed:',error);});}setBackgroundPlaybackRate(rate){this.audioBackground.playbackRate=rate;}getAudioBackground(){return this.audioBackground;}getAudioFail(){return this.audioFail;}}const audioManager=new AudioManager();export default audioManager;
